title: firewood_splitting_for_wood_stove
summary: Splitting firewood for use in the wood-fired stove.
description: This data unit documents the preparation of firewood by manual splitting for use in a wood-fired stove. The activity supports on-site energy usage and is part of daily labor operations within HZ-02.

reference_context.note: Proof 573 documents the construction/preparation of the wood stove.

external_reference.note: External image reference for independent verification.
